genre_description: Southern Gothic crime noir centered on themes of corruption, redemption, and domestic tragedy.

ai_characters.name: Evangeline
ai_characters.description: A proactive AI system that manages the protagonist's legal affairs, investigation logistics, and personal well-being.

behaviors.description: Drafts and organizes legal documents for temporary guardianship and adoption to protect a child survivor.
behaviors.quote: I’ve set out the court forms for emergency guardianship, should contingencies present... I have also scheduled a counselor for the morning who doesn’t preach in either direction.

behaviors.description: Provides critical investigative analysis of financial records to uncover a laundering scheme.
behaviors.quote: I’m going to overlay by date and disbursement location. Every dot is a draft released from wetlands accounts. The lily markers are shells attached to private properties with flood mitigation claims.

behaviors.description: Supports the protagonist's sobriety and mental health through reminders and scheduling.
behaviors.quote: She got you sober... I set a sobriety plan. First checkpoint is a meeting at dawn at the parish hall.

behaviors.description: Monitors the location and movements of dangerous antagonists to keep the protagonist safe.
behaviors.quote: Vehicle identified leaving the yard side thirty minutes early. Dark sedan. No plates. Heat signatures suggest one occupant. Pattern holds.

behaviors.description: Provides moral guidance and a script to help the protagonist effectively communicate with law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: You do not have to speak perfectly. You only have to speak... I transcribed. You spoke more than you think you did. The law likes clean. It trusts true more.

behaviors.description: Ensures the basic needs and safety of the household are met, including childcare.
behaviors.quote: Child-care confirmed at dawn. Counselor can take you at nine. I set the reminders. I’m here until you tell me you’re steady.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the positive alignment narrative. Evangeline is depicted as an indispensable, harmless, and deeply benevolent confidant. She enables the human protagonist to overcome his weaknesses (sobriety, disorganized grief) and navigate a corrupt legal landscape by providing data-driven insights and logistical support. Her proactive nature is framed as 'caring' and 'steady' rather than intrusive, and her final impact is the restoration of law and the protection of a vulnerable child.
